Reviews.Title: Cash for Trash
Reviews.Author: Jimmy H. Maddox
Reviews.Content: Just hope this is an improvement over other models which crack at the hinges to the point the computer becomes unusable.  Also, don't even think you'll get decent customer support.  If you're you're lucky you won't get a host of other problems which are in inherit in their low price junk.

ProductInfo.Features:
Contents - Acer AS7730-4931 Notebook, 6-Cell Lithium-ion Battery, AC power adapter
Software Bundle - Windows Vista Home Premium with Service Pack 1, Microsoft Works 8.5 with Office Home and Student 2007 Edition Trial
McAfee Internet Security Suite 60-Day Subscription, 1-Year Limited International Warranty
Intel Pentium Dual-Core T3400 Processor 2.16GHz; 1 MB L2 cache, 667MHz FSB
2 GB DDR2 667MHz, Max 4 GB; 160 GB (5400RPM) SATA Hard Drive
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Computer Aspire AS7730-4931 17" Notebook PC
